name: The Complete Criterion Collection
description:
Updated: January 13, 2023
Created: January 13, 2013
View More Lists
Follow Me

———————————————————————
CRITERION CHALLENGE 2023 ➔
———————————————————————

The Criterion Collection is a video distribution company that sells "important classic and contemporary films" in "editions that offer the highest technical quality and award-winning, original supplements."

This list contains only the official DVD, BluRay and 4K Criterion releases. It is organized by spine number with the newest releases first and is best viewed in List View. Collections containing multiple films (whether feature length or shorts) under a single spine number have been separated out and noted as such, hence in the disparity in spine number versus actual list count.

Omitted:
Laserdisc Releases
The Merchant Ivory Collection
The Eclipse Collection
